__e: This is a pleasant surprise, because the truth is,
Before we go any further, I have a very nice surprise for you:
That's... that's quite a pleasant surprise.
I know. I got here, and I wanted it to be nice, and it's not nice already.
Sometimes my work isn't very pleasant, and I have to do things that I don't like doing.
What I did, it wasn't nice, and it wasn't fair.
So it's lovely to see you both again.
It's just... so nice, having the two of you here.
Fun as it is having you guys over day and night, it's getting kind of late.
Yeah, I like how you always give your best.
When you see that everybody did a good job, it's very pleasant.
No, but it's good to know you're on my side.
And it sure would be nice not to have to invent reasons every day just to come by and see you.
And, you know, it's not pleasant to do that with somebody who doesn't want to do it.
And it may seem like we have nothing left to talk about, but sometimes it's nice not to have to talk.
It's so nice to be out here with you, just away from the rest of the world and... Hmm.
I meant it just feels nice being here. That's all.
I didn't think it would be so nice to be here.
And this might not be easy to hear, but I need to say this, okay?
That's good to hear, but I want to have the best chance of winning this, and I'm not going to pretend you're not it.
Listen, Someka, you may not want to hear this but I think it's for your own good
- At least he's nice to look at.
Give us the best-looking game in town.
I think it makes me look a little more fetching.
I know I wasn't the easiest person to live with this summer.
It isn't the most pleasant thing in the world. But it's not that bad, really.
And now, I got something very pleasing to tell you.
Being an A isn't as fun as people think.
If it were like this, then my Mu Won's father wouldn't have died without even knowing the reason why.
